name: Weather widget
desc: In this weather app, a user can enter the city name and get the weather information of the particular city from API.[using HTML,CSS,JS]

name: Review Probe Job
desc: A website (and application) for job seekers to find their perfect job, as well as recruiters to find a perfect match for their role and position according to their need with available e-score feature.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website consists of 'Home', 'About', 'Skills', 'Education', 'Projects', 'Work experience' and 'Contact' section

name: To-Do website
desc: In this website user can add their tasks and mark their particular task as complete or incomplete. Here, I used Local Storage that will store the task To-Do list in the web browser.

name: Automatic Water Dispenser
desc: In this hardware based project when one user will bring their hand infront of IR sensor then dispenser will dispense water without manual operation.

name: IPL dashboard
desc: An interactive IPL Analysis Dashboard in Power BI, providing comprehensive insights into team performances, player statistics, and match outcomes.
